How valuable is rushing for each QB?

Total EPA vs Total Rushing EPA

Daniel Jones:
Total EPA = 49.6 (10th)
Total Rushing EPA = 25.7 (4th)

More than half of Jones’ EPA comes from rushing!

If you subtract out EPA from all QB runs, Jones would rank 14th in EPA/play

#nflverse https://t.co/tMuPev9sDr

Added EPA/Play from All QB Rushes

• Tua has the highest overall EPA/play despite a negative EPA/play on QB rushes

• Fields (and Kyler and Russ) have a +EPA/play bc of their QB Rushes

• Daniel Jones has the 4th highest added EPA/play from rushes

KC vs LAC Snaps by Formations!!! Here's KC's offense. Successful in every formation that had multiple snaps. Jet is still getting the majority of the 11 personnel RB snaps. Watson is clearly the JuJu replacement. Moore with a season high % of everything. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WOhj0UxRey

Defense. Mixed bag here, as is typically the case when you face a good offense. Our defense did well in 3-3-5 and 3-2-6, not so great in 4-2-5 or 4-3-4. Karlaftis with a season low snap %.

NOTE: Dunlap is officially listed as a LB. Blame KC and NFL for that. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/WZyca5BpFO

Here's LAC's numbers for the game. Positive EPA/play for every offensive formation. That's impressive. Overall, though, our D held them to 0.14 EPA/play, which is solid vs a good O. On defense, they got absolutely COOKED in their top two formations.
